title: The Relationship Between Temperament and Disease in Magnetotherapy
first_phrase: In the preceding text, Huter’s theory of temperament and its relation to physical form and intellectual inclination was discussed. Now, the focus shifts to the classification of diseases based on polar disharmonies - positive or electric diseases caused by an excess of body heat and negative diseases caused by a lack of body warmth. Even mental disorders exhibit polar disharmonies, with mania related to an excess of electric forces in the brain and melancholia related to an excess of magnetic forces. By understanding the balance of electromagnetic forces in the human body, it becomes easier to treat diseases.

Bleibt das Gleichgewicht der elektromagnetischen Kräfte bis zu einem gewissen Grade erhalten, so zeigt sich dies als Gesundheit. - Von diesem Standpunkt aus das Wesen der Krankheiten betrachtet, vereinfacht sich die Anwendung der Heilkunde ungemein.
last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the balance of electromagnetic forces within the body simplifies the application of healing methods. While scientific analysis may miss this insight, a simple mind can grasp it. The knowledge of the magnetic healing properties leads us towards successful healing, despite not fully understanding the source of the power.
